issue.title: [CF 587] icon issue
issue.body:
I set an icon to monitor corruption and another for immolate
when I changed spec from affliction to destruction, when there was an immolate on the target, not only icon for immolate was shown but also the icon for corruption was shown (this icon shown in immolate as well) and I was definitely sure that I did not add immolate into corruption icon.

then I figured out that the reason for this could be that in the MOP, spells of different spec would be changed automatically when you swap specs, e.g. you can make a macro that /cast shadow bolt under destruction but it will automatically cast an incinerate for you.

any solution for this, thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user a1204350 | Imported from CurseForge issue #587 | Raw

comments.body:
Please do not ignore the default ticket template. You need to include the export strings of the icons that you are having trouble with.
